article_title: Doctors Face A 24% Pay Cut In Both Medicare And Medicaid Reimbursements

article_metadata.description: Doctors face a 24 percent cut in Medicare reimbursements come January, unless Congress acts; but thanks to Obamacare they face a 24 percent cut in Medicaid reimbursements as well.
article_metadata.author: Merrill Matthews

og.description: Doctors face a 24 percent cut in Medicare reimbursements come January, unless Congress acts; but thanks to Obamacare they face a 24 percent cut in Medicaid reimbursements as well.
